tha-ap340:14.1: Koseyyakambaliyāni → koseyyakambalīyāni (bj); koseyyakambalāni ca (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
tha-ap340:19.1: Aviññattaṁ nivāsemi → aviññatti nisevāmi (pts-vp-pli1); aviññattāni sevāmi (?)
tha-ap340:19.3: Lābhī → lābhimhi (sya1ed, sya2ed); lābhī hi (pts-vp-pli1) | annassa pānassa → annapānassa (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
